value:
$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Ah, hello, Askrans. The day we've all
been waiting for is finally here. How
will you celebrate Veronica's death?$k$pVery soon now...when the sun
reaches its apex, the execution
will commence.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse...$k$pCan Zacharias stop her?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Don't worry. I'm certain Zacharias
has a plan.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|If you wish to convey any last
messages to Veronica, now is
the time.$k$pI will arrange to have her head sent
to you—but I don't think she will be
very talkative.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|H-how can you say such things?!
You're terrible!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_10,0|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I suppose we can withdraw... But do
know that I have won here, even so.$k$pYou understand, don't you, Prince
Alfonse? You've lost.$k$pWhile you've been preoccupied with
us here, Veronica's execution has just
been completed.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|It is too bad we had to miss it.$k$pRegardless, as promised, you can
expect to have Veronica's head
delivered to you in short order.$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Director Letizia! I have a report!$k$pThe princess has been removed
from her cell, and...and—$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The next words out of your mouth
had better be that the execution
has proceeded without incident...$k$p$WmMEID_エンブラ兵,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|The guards released the princess!
They let her go!$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...I beg your pardon.$k$pWhat is the meaning of—$k$pThey freed her?! Treachery! I ordered
an execution—one simple execution!$k$pHow is this possible?! Are these fool
soldiers truly so completely useless?$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|The error was on your part,
not theirs, Letizia.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-YOU!$k$p

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|You lie well, Letizia.$k$pAnd you lie enough to conceal
the truth, and even undo it.$k$pYour mistake was thinking those
lies would never catch up to you,
that you could simply dictate.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|The more lies you tell to disguise
the true nature of things, the more
fragile that facade becomes.$k$pThe further from the truth, the easier
the lie is to strip away. With those
falsehoods gone, you are exposed...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you suggesting?!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|You spread yourself too thin,
trying to cover up the truth.$k$pYou needed to involve people outside
your inner circle. Surely you knew
they weren't all perfectly loyal...$k$pSome even told me whatever
I wanted to know in full view
of other soldiers.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I see...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Of course, they could offer me no
proof of what they told me, which
I'm sure was a part of your plan.$k$pBut once the roots of doubt take
hold of the heart, it is a difficult
weed to remove indeed...$k$pWho is in the right? Veronica or
Letizia? Even the prison guards
were unsure.$k$pBut they all soon realized the truth.
And in their own way, I might add.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrr... How dare you!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|Veronica will soon arrive joined by
the forces from the prison keep.$k$pHurry away if you want any hope
of escape.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You...you... I will not forget this!$k$pAnd I will make you regret it!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, Zacharias. It seems
you've managed to come to our
rescue once again.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Smile|I should be the one thanking you.
But matters are not yet settled.$k$p$EFace|The imperial forces are divided
between Veronica and Letizia...$k$pThe fight is not over yet.$k$p$Sbs150|
